channel.title: CVE Feed for Kognetiks -- Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kognetiks -- Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-35738|2024-08-02T03:14:54.146Z -- kognetiks -- kognetiks%20chatbot%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kognetiks Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress: from n/a through 1.9.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-4560|2024-08-01T20:47:41.085Z -- kognetiks -- kognetiks%20chatbot%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the chatbot_chatgpt_upload_file_to_assistant function in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers, with to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-4560|2024-06-06T19:50:16.800Z -- kognetiks -- kognetiks%20chatbot%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the chatbot_chatgpt_upload_file_to_assistant function in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers, with to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-32700|2024-05-17T08:27:02.991Z -- kognetiks -- kognetiks%20chatbot%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Kognetiks Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress.This issue affects Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress: from n/a through 2.0.0.

item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Kognetiks Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress.This issue affects Kognetiks Chatbot for WordPress: from n/a through 2.0.0.
